mapper.select: select BNO, BTITLE, to_char(BWRITE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') BWRITE_DATE, MID, BREF, BRE_LEVEL, BRE_STEP from BOARD order by BREF desc, BRE_STEP asc
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD values (#{nextVal}, #{dto.btitle}, #{dto.bcontent}, default, #{dto.mid} , (select bref from board where bno=#{bno}) , (select bre_level+1 from board where bno=#{bno}) , (select bre_step+1 from board where bno=#{bno})
mapper.update: update board set BRE_STEP = BRE_STEP + 1 where BRE_STEP > (select bre_step from board where bno=#{bno}) and BREF = (select bref from board where bno=#{bno})
update board set btitle=#{dto.btitle}, bcontent=#{dto.bcontent} where bno=#{bno}
